entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ref escape analysis errors are not reported for compound assignment #63852
  • Convert To Record Improvements #63849
  • Address feedback on "File types EE support" #63847
    17.4
  • [LSP] Missing export for project contexts in TS #63844
  • LSIF Generation requires "free range" tracking resulting in heavy memory overhead for larger projects #63842
  • LSIF generation uses inVs on invalid nodes #63841
  • LSIF generation can't be interpreted by 0.6.0 validators #63840
  • Unused Variable Analysis Does Not Account for Local Function Default Parameter Values #63837
    Backlog
  • CSharpSyntaxTreeFactoryServiceFactory+CSharpSyntaxTreeFactoryService+RecoverableSyntaxTree.WithRootAndOptions does not preserve the Encoding property #63834
    17.4

Closed

  • Convert To Record Timeline #63137
    17.4
  • [Regression] "Rename symbol's file" option gets forgotten #63810
    17.4
  • Improve error recovery for use of 'ref readonly' instead of 'in' #63758
    Backlog
  • [Flaky test] GoToImplementationOpensProvisionalTabIfDocumentNotOpen #60071
    17.4
  • Issue with error CS0114 and CS0109 #63821
    17.4
  • StringCopyPaste test phyically write to the clipboard causing flakyness #61764
    Backlog
  • `Convert to raw string` refactoring is available for incompatible C# versions #63592
    17.4
  • "Preview referenced changes" on Change Signature dialog doesn't preview changes #63831
  • Source Generators incompatible with .Net7 #63806
  • [LSP] Semantic classification does not work in the interactive window #63148
    17.4
  • Experimental C# LSP Completions committed with overtypeable characters don't overtype #55187
    17.3
  • [LSP] Semantic tokens flickering #61239
  • Pressing 'enter' in a single-line raw-string-literal should convert it to multi-line. #59835
    17.3
  • CI build fails due to Azure package feed error 503 (Service Unavailable) #57565
  • [LSP] Semantic tokens slow to colorize when typing #61393
    Backlog
  • Compiler lacks ways to get to the built-in operator methods it synthesizes from the semantic model #63186
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Update tests to assert different behavior on .net core #63851
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Update DefiniteAssignment Pass to Account for Local Default Parameter Values #63850
    Area-Compilers
  • Convert to Record (Non-positional) #63848
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63843
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Stop performing LOC on 17.3 branch and start localizing 17.4. #63839
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Semantic snippets - prop snippet #63838
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for Suppression/Configuration fixes for build-only diagno… #63835
    Area-IDE
  • Unify handling of directive parsing accross multiple code paths #63832
    Area-Compilers
  • Give a specific error when a file type is duplicated in the same file #63829
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Extract out diagnostic sources into their own files #63846
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move 'Todo Comments' to EA pattern #63817
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Simplify FSA computation of workspace diagnostics in LSP #63845
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not go back from Solution instance to Workspace #63836
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix rename file option so it only updates with user changes #63827
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Restore live update behavior in new inline rename #63783
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Better error recovery when 'readonly' is used as a parameter modifier #63777
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • [BULK] DocuTune - Fix build validation issues: docs-link-absolute #63791
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63833
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63830
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Provide way to dynamically create builtin-operator symbols off of a compilation #63408
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63828
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Semantic snippets - for loop snippet #62990
    Area-IDE
  • Get pipelineid from env vars #63785
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Check method arguments must match for property accessors #63809
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add progress bar to document outline window #63011
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #63794
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Move todo-comments onto LSP. #63784
    Area-IDE
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE
  • Convert To Record Refactoring/Code Fix initial offering #63654
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change) #63616
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Use the term 'parameter' instead of 'formal parameter' #63825
    Area-Compilers
  • Propagate EffectiveScope to parameters of anonymous delegate types. #63787
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Clean up implementation of SymbolInfo #63698
    Area-Compilers
  • Use net7.0 in source-build #62916
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Propagate In/Out attributes on local functions #63824
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Ban api #62921
    Area-IDE
  • Build only test projects and split out building TFMs into separate queues #63677
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Completion textedits cursor #60499
    Area-IDE
  • Support changing return types of methods, properties, events #63486
    Area-Interactive
  • When shrinking breakpoints down to less lines, stick to the end of the range #63731
    Area-IDE
  • Some improvements to Workspace.CanApplyChanges #63701
    Area-IDE
